name: Human Resources
description: Handles recruitment, payroll, and employee relations.

name: Engineering
description: Responsible for product development, coding, and technical maintenance.

name: Marketing
description: Manages marketing campaigns, brand strategy, and social media.

name: Finance
description: Oversees accounting, budgeting, and financial planning.

name: Customer Support
description: Provides assistance and resolves customer inquiries and complaints.

name: Legal
description: Manages contracts, compliance, and legal matters.
